item.question:
narcissistic
[ˌnɑːrsɪˈsɪstɪk ]
item.answer:
【考法】adj. 自恋的：having an undue fascination with oneself
【例】He tried to raise a sense of social consciousness of the normally narcissistic Hollywood community. 他试着在通常无比自恋的好莱坞圈子中激起一丝社会意识。
【近】egotistical, self-absorbed, self-centered, self-infatuated, self-obsessed, selfpreoccupied
【反】self-forgetting, selfless, unselfish, altruistic 无私的
